trans-unit.source: Defines an ordered list of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> objects that is applied to unsigned content prior to digest calculation.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en sortert liste over <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref> objektene som skal brukes på usignerte innhold før digest beregning.

trans-unit.source: The TransformChain class contains a list of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> objects that determine how to order XML data before creating a digest.
trans-unit.target: Klassen TransformChain inneholder en liste over <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>objekter som bestemmer hvordan å sortere XML-data før du oppretter et sammendrag.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>

trans-unit.source: Use the TransformChain class whenever you need to add one or more transform objects to an encrypted XML document or to a signed XML document.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TransformChain klassen når du skal legge til én eller flere objekter for transformeringen i en kryptert XML-dokument eller en signert XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> class and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> class contain a TransformChain object.
trans-unit.target: Både den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>klassen og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference>klasse inneholde et TransformChain-objekt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> class by calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.AddTransform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>objekt i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>klassen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.AddTransform%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.AddTransform%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> class by calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.AddTransform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>objekt i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference>klassen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.AddTransform%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.AddTransform%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a TransformChain object manually and pass it to either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.TransformChain%2A> property or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.TransformChain%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette et objekt for TransformChain manuelt og sende den til enten den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.TransformChain%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.TransformChain%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.TransformChain%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.TransformChain%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to sign only a portion of an XML document, you can use a transform to identify the XML elements you intend to sign.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil registrere en del av en XML-dokumentet, kan du bruke en transformering til å identifisere XML-elementer du vil logge.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A> property and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.Uri%2A> property automatically create internal transforms that allow you to sign a portion of a document.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.Uri%2A>egenskapen Opprett automatisk intern transformeringer som gjør det mulig å registrere en del av et dokument.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.Uri%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about transforms, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om transformeringer, kan du se spesifikasjonen XMLDSIG som er tilgjengelig fra W3C på www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, eller se spesifikasjonen XML-kryptering, som er tilgjengelig fra W3C på www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds a transform to the list of transforms to be applied to the unsigned content prior to digest calculation.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en transformering i listen over transformeringer som skal brukes til usignerte innholdet før digest beregning.

trans-unit.source: The transforms are applied to the unsigned content in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain> object.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringene brukes til usignerte innholdet i rekkefølgen de ble lagt til i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain>

trans-unit.source: The transform to add to the list of transforms.
trans-unit.target: Transformering å legge til i listen over transformeringer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall transformeringer i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The number of transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Antall transformeringer i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator of the transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting av transformeringer i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the transforms in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting av transformeringer i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the transform at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter transformeringen i den angitte indeksen i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The index into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object that specifies which transform to return.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objekt som angir som transformeringen skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The transform at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringen i den angitte indeksen i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is greater than the number of transforms.
trans-unit.target: Den index parameteren er større enn antallet transformeringer.
